purify_sparsemat Struct Reference

int * rowind
int * colptr

Detailed Description

Definition of a sparse matrix stored in compressed column storage format.

Note:
See Numerical Recipes for description of compressed column storage.

Definition at line 15 of file purify_sparsemat.h.
